channel.name: Dubai One En AE
channel.title: King Lear
channel.desc: History 2018 An elderly King, seeking to step down from his throne, inadvertently sets the stage for calamity by relinquishing his power to his deceitful and sycophantic daughters, while turning his back on the one child who truly loves and speaks honestly to him. Richard Eyre, Jim Broadbent, Jim Carter, Tobias Menzies, Anthony Hopkins, Richard Eyre, Emily Watson.
